content: Hey folks, if we want to include the CDS Hooks icon (https://cds-hooks.org/images/logo-square.png) in our software, what are the terms and conditions around this? Is this clarified somewhere explicitly?
I've created a GitHub issue for this: https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/issues/475 since it will be useful to have this info easily searchable.
difficult question, actually. @Josh Mandel where did the icon come from?

Initially @Kevin Shekleton (or rather, a designer at Cerner?) designed this based on the visual characteristics of the SMART logo. Cerner assigned the copyright to Boston Children's Hospital so CDS Hooks could parallel the same path as SMART.
(I'll suggest that we try to capture discussion on GitHub because it's easier to point outside folks to that as a public web page.)
